attributes.action: Limited Companies to be banned from fielding candidates in political elections
attributes.additional_details: limited companies, companies or non political parties should be banned from fielding multiple candidates in UK political elections
attributes.background: there seems to be a trend of parties fielding candidates that seem to exepmt from funding and campaigning legislation. Only political parties or independent candidates should be able to stand in political elections in UK

rejection.details:
Registration of political parties is a matter for the Electoral Commission, which is independent of both the Government and Parliament.

You could raise this issue with the Electoral Commission. You can find out how to contact the Electoral Commission here:

https://www.electoralcommission.org.uk/contact-us
